name: emailverifications
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool fast_email_verifier.
Tool description: APISOLUTION services provide a comprehensive API for fast email validation and verification for any developer to use on start-ups and staff projects.
API description: He is  a simple way  to verify a list of email addresses with different dimensions.

emailsimple.description: Comma-separated list of email addresses to verify. Default is 'mbavazijoshua@gmail.com,apisolution@gmail.com'.
